<title level="1" pfs="">[Tino (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1445)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Tino (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1445)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 10</row>

**Perception** +18

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Irori Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[+1 explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [+1 striking handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +16 

+1 status to all saves vs. disease
</row>

**HP** 150

**[Retributive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=31)** <actions string="Reaction" /> If Tino hits with his Retributive Strike, the target takes 3 persistent good damage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 bludgeoning

**Focus Spells** DC 24, 3 Focus Points
- **5th**
[Ki Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=484), [Ki Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=486), [Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395)

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Tino makes two Strikes with his fist or with a [monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112) weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Powerful Fists**   Tino's fist Strikes don't take penalties when making lethal attacks.

</column>
name: Tino (Level 9)

text: Tino (Level 9) Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 36 Unspecific Lore : DC 34 Specific Lore : DC 31 Tino (Level 9) Source Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 10 Perception +18 Languages Common, Nagaji, Tengu, Tien Skills Acrobatics +21, Athletics +20, Diplomacy +18, Irori Lore +15, Medicine +16 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +1 Cha +3 Items +1 explorer's clothing, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows --- AC 28 Fort +18 Ref +19 Will +16 +1 status to all saves vs. disease HP 150 Retributive Strike Reaction If Tino hits with his Retributive Strike, the target takes 3 persistent good damage. --- Speed 40 feet Melee Single Action fist +20 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 2d8+9 bludgeoning Focus Spells DC 24, 3 Focus Points - 5th Ki Blast, Ki Strike, Lay on Hands Flurry of Blows Single Action (Flourish) Tino makes two Strikes with his fist or with a monk weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Powerful Fists Tino's fist Strikes don't take penalties when making lethal attacks.
